name: CAVESLASH
description:
Caveslash is a dungeon crawler. In it, each room of the dungeon is represented by four entities that can be monsters, potions, weapons, dragons, or hearts. You interact with said entities (doing things like fighting monsters, equipping weapons, etc.) in order to move onto the next room. There are also chest rooms that have a chance of being a mimic, but if it isn't then you get a special item. Go until you die!

Current version: 1.0.0
